    • Method Detail

      • tagSuggest

        @RequestMapping(value="/tag/{tagName}/{searchPrefix}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<String[]> tagSuggest(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String tagName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String searchPrefix)
        Get suggestion for tags based on current tags defined on the components.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the tag for which to get suggestion.
        searchPrefix - The current prefix for the tag suggestion.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains a list of suggestions for the tag key.
